quote: Au milieu de l'hiver, j'ai découvert en moi un invincible été
author: Albert Camus

quote: On ne voit bien qu'avec le cœur. L'essentiel est invisible pour les yeux.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quote: I am a man. Nothing human is alien to me
author: Terence

quote: Until you make the unconscious conscious, it will direct your life and you will call it fate.
author: Carl Jung

quote: No man ever steps in the same river twice, for it is not the same river and he is not the same man.
author: Heraclitus

quote: Life can only be understood backwards; but it must be lived forwards.
author: Søren Kierkegaard

quote: Think lightly of yourself and deeply of the world.
author: Miyamoto Musashi

quote: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: The privilege of a lifetime is to become who you truly are."
author: Carl Jung

quote: You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: You have to be a warrior to be a poet.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: The most powerful weapon you can use to change the world is education.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: The act of creation is first of all an act of destruction.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: The treasure you seek is in the cave you fear to enter.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: It took me four years to paint like Raphael, but a lifetime to paint like a child.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Do not send for whom the bell tolls; it tolls for thee.
author: John Donne

quote: Knowing your own darkness is the best method for dealing with the darknesses of other people.
author: Carl Jung
